com.premiumminds.billy.core.persistence.dao

Class TransactionWrapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.premiumminds.billy.core.persistence.dao.TransactionWrapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The transaction return type

    public abstract class TransactionWrapper<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Francisco Vargas A class that ensures that ONE transaction is active. If a transaction is not already active, then a new one is created. Transaction management is ignored otherwise.

      Runs the transaction instructions
